sentence.Network_en: The government has behaved with crass insensitivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 该政府行事愚蠢而且麻木不仁。

sentence.Network_en: the crass questions all disabled people get asked
sentence.Network_cn: 所有残疾人都会碰到的愚蠢而缺乏同情心的提问

sentence.Network_en: Crass materialism causes people to forget spiritual values.
sentence.Network_cn: 极端唯物主义使人忘掉精神价值.

list.abs: crass materialism causes people to forget spiritual values .极端唯物主义使人们忘记精神的价值。
years and years in this crass world ., 年复一年的在这个尘世上.
crass frequently paused to mop the perspiration his face and neck with his serviette .克拉斯常停下来用餐巾擦擦脸上和头颈里的汗珠。

today , thankfully , even some the marquee members of the Cox Commission sadly realize that they were being used for crass political purposes and that the whole deal was the hype of all hypes .今天，谢天谢地，甚至考克斯委员会的一些成员也难过地意识到他们被拙劣的政治目的利用了，整个事件就是各种宣传的宣传。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'dense or coarse (in constitution or texture'): from Latin crassus 'solid, thick'

entry.tran: (行为)愚蠢而无同情心的，不为他人考虑的
entry.def: Crass behaviour is stupid and does not show consideration for other people.

example.ex: The government has behaved with crass insensitivity...
example.tran: 该政府行事愚蠢而且麻木不仁。

example.ex: Pop records can be crass and cynical.
example.tran: 流行音乐唱片可能会是冷漠而且愤世嫉俗的。

means.word_mean: 1. (of persons) so unrefined as to be lacking in discrimination and sensibility

means.word_mean: 愚笨的,粗鲁的;全然不顾他人的

sentences.en: I didn’t want any part of this silly reception. It was all so crass.
sentences.cn: 我完全不想参加这个无聊的欢迎会。它实在太糟糕了。
